TravLITE GuideÂ¶

What began as a DOS prompt NPC generator escalated into a web-browsed one...

TravLITE is an easy-to-use open source NPC generator for Mongoose Traveller 1st and 2nd Editions. It's written in Classic Python 2.5 and includes diceroll 3.1 for its die rolling. Source for diceroll 3.1 can be found at its GitHub repository.

TravLITE features minor logging and error tracking at this time.

This documentation explains how to install and use TravLITE for Traveller NPC generation.
